official_title: A bill to amend the definition of "vessel of the United States" in the Magnuson Fishery Conservation and Management Act.

summary.text: Amends the Magnuson Fishery Conservation and Management Act to revise the definition of "vessel of the United States." Provides that no vessel first documented after April 6, 1987, shall be considered a "vessel of the United States" unless such vessel is documented under specified laws relating to fishery licenses and registry which include considerations of where such vessel was built.

titles.title: A bill to amend the definition of "vessel of the United States" in the Magnuson Fishery Conservation and Management Act.
